about.description: After completing my Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, my journey in UI/UX design and web development began. My initial role as a Web Developer was instrumental in refining my attention to detail, where I mastered conceptualizing, creating mockups, and finalizing designs for websites. In this role, I focused on creating user-friendly interfaces and enhancing user experiences for web and mobile applications. This career phase bridged the gap between aesthetics and functionality, sharpening my skills in designing visually appealing and seamless experiences. My career progression led me into Web Application and Mobile Development, where I applied my design insights to build robust applications and adhered to best practices. This role expanded my technical skills and deepened my understanding of the intricate relationship between front-end design and back-end functionality. As a Software Engineer today, I integrate my diverse experiences in design, user experience, and development. I am committed to building sophisticated software solutions, leading initiatives, and advancing my technical skills. My goal is to create impactful and innovative applications, constantly pushing beyond my limits to grow further in my software engineering career. I am actively seeking professional opportunities that present new challenges and leverage my comprehensive skill set as a Software Engineer.

topics.description: An electronics retailer's app and website were due for an update. Sales were going up the roof, and customers were getting a little antsy with the old-school interface, begging for something that would make their shopping experience easier and more engaging. The owners weren't afraid to try a new style or to break some rules—they had been in business for years and had seen trends come and go without losing any of their loyal customers.

Input from focus groups showed that people liked the store's selection of big-ticket items, but they also wanted to be able to find what they needed quickly. They wanted a shop that offered the best deals on electronics, with the best quality products. They wanted to have access to knowledgeable salespeople who could answer any questions about products or help them choose one that was right for them.

topics.topic: Your next car is waiting for you.
topics.description: You can even choose which one you want to see.

If you're like most people, you dread going to the dealership when you need to buy a new car. You worry that there aren't any cars in your price range, or that they won't have a car to fit your needs. Maybe you do not even like the whole experience of going into a dealership and dealing with the pressure they put on you. It's no wonder people put off buying a new car until they absolutely have to… Or don't buy one at all.

topics.topic: After you are enlisted as a member of the gym, this application allows you to schedule and/or book spinning classes, personal trainers, and any other desired activities that your gym offers - all in the palm of your hands! This flexible and accessible approach that this application offers, will help you organize your gym time and preferences to your convenience. No more lines, calls, or wait times! Scheduling ahead of time will be your best option to never miss a gym day again.

topics.description: The character and beauty of the antique, vintage and antique jewellery is what makes it so appealing to customers. The owner wanted to give customers an easy way to access the vast collection and bring this beautiful treasure into their homes. He created an app that allows customers to buy from his shop from anywhere at any time. Customers can simply use the app to discover a piece of jewellery that's perfect for them, purchase it, and have it delivered right to their door.
